# Get Contact

# Description

Retrieves a contact in HubSpot CRM.

# Untitled Section

text="Type the content"

# Configuration

* 
* Contact - Select the contact from the drop-down list or enter a custom contact ID. You can retrieve the contact ID from the output of a Create contact activity or a List All Records → contact (object) activity. This field supports String type input.









* Contacts - Automatically generated output variable.
